name: Maria Hwang
body:
### Happy Birthday
I love you Maria, thanks for everything. I can show you how to edit this page really easily (its all plain text) and make a nice personal page. 

### About Me
I am a Doctoral Candidate  at Teachers College of Columbia University. My twitter handle is [@mariahwang502](https://twitter.com/mariahwang502)

### Monster Appetite
You can check out code for my dissertation on my github account or see the [live version](http://monster-appetite.meteor.com/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
